Leeruniek

Together, weâ€™re on a path to sustainable and more equitable use of educational data.

What I do there

  • The product team is my launching pad for how I roam the company. Iâ€™m primarily concerned with anything to do with user experience: from research-informed large-scale decisions to the details of our design system.
  • Outside of the product team I advocate for the people working with our company by coaching non-UX staff in user-centered thinking, and by giving them concrete tools to get the answers they need.
